name: Avoid Toxic Rats
description:
Simple game for trijam in which you have to prevent toxic rats from being bitten. Only top quality healthy rats should be our food. This game is a joke, sorry if anyone is offended, but let them know that the rataburgers are delicious.

Controls: Space --> Hammer.

Rat assets are free of my account, other assets are made for my this afeternoon.

Press: 1+ point if you crush a toxic rat and -1 point if you crush a healthy and tasty rat.

Healthy rats: +1 point if they reach the crusher.

Toxic rats: -1 point if they reach the shredder.

A game dedicated to my students, as long as you don't give a game, you invite me to a beer.

Sound:  https://freesound.org/people/ldezem/sounds/386095/

https://freesound.org/people/Latawoo/sounds/543692/
